paragraphs.text: It's the patriotism, stupid. What liberal critics don't get about "American Sniper".
paragraphs.label: title

paragraphs.text: There' s no denying it
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Clint Eastwood's "American Sniper" has struck a chord with the American people, and did so by tapping into the deepest civic values we have as Americans - duty, honor, fidelity, courage, love for country...and a love for others
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: However
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: no war movie can live on the big screen without a spew of liberal backlash
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: this film is no different
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Criticism has come quickly from Michael Moore, Seth Rogen, former Vermont Gov  Howard Dean and other Hollywood leftists
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Thankfully, some things speak louder than cowardly tweets
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: like the more than $200 million in ticket sales the movie has raked in just one week
paragraphs.label: statistics

paragraphs.text: In fact
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the new war film featuring Bradley Cooper as well-known Navy SEAL sniper, Chris Kyle, is on pace to become the top-grossing war film of all time
paragraphs.label: statistics

paragraphs.text: As much as the left would like you to believe it
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Chris Kyle was not a bloodthirsty warmonger
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: he was a noble warrior who fought to defend his fellow troops, watched over the lives of his brothers, and advanced the cause of (eventual) peace
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This is where the true success of "American Sniper" comes to light
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The film is not a movie about the Iraq war, or whether we won or lost; or even whether our motivations were justified
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Instead
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: it's a story about a man and the many trials of war, including coming home from it
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In the words of my good friend and former Army Ranger, Sean Parnell,"[American Sniper] isn't a pro-war film. It's a pro-warrior film."
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: That's the key
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The movie is a testament to the warrior - to the man in the arena
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Everyone criticizing the film is on the sidelines hurling insults
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Chris was in the arena, fighting for us in a dangerous and complicated war
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Nonetheless
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: outspoken liberals will continue to cast judgment, saying that they support the warrior but not the war
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: But they contradict themselves even on that point
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The left sees warriors--men like Chris Kyle--as bloodthirsty and ignorant Americans from fly-over country who cling to God and guns in blind support of our military
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: They dislike both the warandthe warrior
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Nothing could be further from the truth
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In reality, middle-America is full of hard working people of faith and fidelity who love their nation and believe in celebrating someone like Chris Kyle
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: These are people who feel like they're already taxed enough, that the government is over-bearing in their lives, that religion has been stripped from every aspect of civil society, and that the president is misguided in his gutting of their military
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: They are, in a word, patriots
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Despite their frustrations with leftists, middle America is the beating heart of our nation and remains the first in line to selflessly strap on their boots and defend the very freedoms that people like Michael Moore use to criticize them
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It's awfully easy for progressives to cast criticism down from their isolated ivory towers
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: but
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: next time they consider demeaning the warriors protecting them afar, as Chris Kyle once did, they may want to consider who protects those towers and keeps them from tumbling
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: They're not only the folks who see this movie
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: but
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: more often than not, they're the kind of people depicted in these movies
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: They're the kind of people who embody"citizenship," and the very idea of living and fighting for something bigger than oneself
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Chris Kyle understood that
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Today's servicemen and women understand that
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: And that's why millions of people are seeing this movie
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: They want to celebrate and believe in America again, if only for two short hours in a crowded dark theater
paragraphs.label: assumption
